text: Brandon David Reed (born March 22, 1987) is an American former professional football wide receiver. He played parts of 4 years in the National Football League (NFL). He played for the Baltimore Ravens and Indianapolis Colts. Reed was drafted out of the University of Utah by the Baltimore Ravens with the 156th pick in the fifth round of the 2010 NFL Draft. He won Super Bowl XLVII with the Ravens when they defeated the San Francisco 49ers 34-31. On August 21, 2013, the Ravens traded Reed to the Indianapolis Colts in exchange for Delone Carter. He played 7 games with the Colts. He was waived on November 26, 2013. On January 14, 2014, he signed with the San Francisco 49ers but was released August 25, 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== *David Reed at nfl.com Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Baltimore Ravens players Category:American football wide receivers Category:Football players from Iowa Category:People from Dubuque, Iowa Category:African-American players of American football Category:Indianapolis Colts players Category:San Francisco 49ers players
title: David Reed (American football)
